title: Seedling
info: The Seedling is a pet summon item that summons a Pet Sapling that follows the player. If the player flies too high or otherwise moves far enough away from it, it will sprout leaflets and use them to fly with the player, acting as "wings". Like all pets on the Desktop Version, it does not attack enemies, nor does it take damage.
stat:
Type
Pet summon
Use time20 (Very fast)
TooltipSummons a Pet Sapling
